description:
Forget about cold hands on the track or the trail, the Wind Block Gloves are made from premium 3-layer softshell fabric for protection from the elements. The fingers are touchscreen compatible so you can flip from one hype song to the next.

  • 3-layer softshell with Dry-Tex waterproof membrane keep hands warm and dry
  • Durable synthetic leather palm provides good grip
  • Touchscreen-compatible fingertips let you use your smartphone without getting cold fingers
  • Reflective details add visibility as the days get shorter
name: MEC T1 Warm Wind Block Gloves - Unisex
